verses.text: \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w mine|strong="H5375"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* four \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* between \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*; \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

\add The chariot \add*wherein \w are|strong="H5483"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w black|strong="H7838"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w goeth|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w toward|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* country; \w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w white|strong="H3836"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w after|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w*; \w and|strong="H5483"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w grisled|strong="H1261"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w toward|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w south|strong="H8486"\w* country.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* bay \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H3212"\w* \w they|strong="H3318"\w* might \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w fro|strong="H1980"\w* \w through|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* earth: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, \w Get|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3212"\w* \w hence|strong="H3212"\w*, \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w fro|strong="H1980"\w* \w through|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* earth. \w So|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3318"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w fro|strong="H1980"\w* \w through|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*, even \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Heldai|strong="H2469"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tobijah|strong="H2900"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jedaiah|strong="H3048"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* come \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* go \w into|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zephaniah|strong="H6846"\w*, whither \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* come \w from|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon;

yea, \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \add of them \add*\w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w crowns|strong="H5850"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w* \w upon|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehozadak|strong="H3087"\w*, \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*;

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* speak \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H8478"\w*, saying, \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* speaketh \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, saying, \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* man \w whose|strong="H8034"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w Branch|strong="H6780"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w grow|strong="H6779"\w* \w up|strong="H1129"\w* \w out|strong="H6779"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*:
